# 查找算法

# 二分 递归实现

使用二分要保证数组有序

let arr = [1,2,3,5,6,7]
function binarySearch(arr, left, right, val) {
    if (left > right) return -1
    let mid = Math.floor((left+right) / 2)
    let midVal = arr[mid]
    if (midVal === val) {
        return mid
    } else if (midVal < val) {
        return binarySearch(arr, mid + 1, right, val)
    } else if (midVal > val) {
        return binarySearch(arr, left, mid-1, val)
    }
}
let index =binarySearch(arr, 0, arr.length - 1, 7)
console.log(index)

function binarySearchNoRecursion(arr, target) {
    let left = 0
    let right =arr.length - 1
    while(left <= right) {
        let mid = Math.floor((left + right) / 2)
        if (arr[mid] === target) {
            return mid
        } else if (arr[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1
        } else {
            left = mid + 1
        }
    }
    return -1
}


// 有重复的找所有下标
function binarySearch2(arr, left, right, val) {
    if (left > right) return []
    let mid = Math.floor((left+right) / 2)
    let midVal = arr[mid]
    if (midVal === val) {
        let temp = mid-1
        let res = []
        while (true) {
            if (temp < 0 || arr[temp] !== val) break
            res.push(temp--)
        }
        res.push(mid)
        temp = mid+1
        while (true) {
            if (temp > arr.length - 1 || arr[temp] !== val) break
            res.push(temp++)
        }
        // return mid
        return res
    } else if (midVal < val) {
        return binarySearch2(arr, mid + 1, right, val)
    } else if (midVal > val) {
        return binarySearch2(arr, left, mid-1, val)
    }
}
let indexList = binarySearch2(arr,0,arr.length-1, 7)
console.log(indexList)

# 插值查找

插值查找用于数据量大且分布较比较均匀<br>
公式：let mid = left + parseInt( ((findVal - arr[left]) / (arr[right] - arr[left]) )* (right - left))

/**
     * key 是要查找的val
     * mid = low + ((key - a[low]) / (a[high] - a[low])) * (high - low)
     */
    arr = []
    for (let i = 1; i <= 100; i++) {
        arr.push(i * 2)
    }
    for (let i = 1; i <= 100; i++) {
        arr.push(i * 3)
    }
    /**
     * 差值查找
     * @param arr
     * @param left
     * @param right
     * @param findVal
     * @returns {number}
     */
    let count = 0
    console.log(arr)
    function insertValueSearch(arr, left, right, findVal) {
        // findVal < arr[0] || findVal > arr[arr.length-1] 必须要有，否则mid可能越界
        count++
       if (left > right || findVal < arr[0] || findVal > arr[arr.length-1]) return -1
        let mid = left + parseInt( ((findVal - arr[left]) / (arr[right] - arr[left]) )* (right - left))
        let midVal = arr[mid]
        if (midVal === findVal) {
            return mid
        } else if (midVal > findVal) {
            return insertValueSearch(arr, left, mid-1, findVal)
        } else if (midVal < findVal) {
            return insertValueSearch(arr, mid + 1, right, findVal)
        }
    }
    console.log(insertValueSearch(arr, 0, arr.length-1, 98))
    console.log('查找了' + count + '次')

# 斐波那契查找算法

    // todo blog
    let maxSize = 20
     // mid = low + f(k-1)-1
    // 构造fib 数组
    function fib() {
        let f = []
        f[0] = 1
        f[1] = 1
        for (let i = 2; i < maxSize; i++) {
            f[i] = f[i-1] + f[i-2]
        }
        return f
    }

    /**
     * 非递归方式
     * mid = low + f(k-1)-1
     * @param arr
     * @param findVal
     * @returns {number}
     */
    function fibSearch(arr, findVal) {
        let low = 0
        let high = arr.length - 1
        let k = 0 // 表示斐波那契分割数值的下标
        let mid = 0
        let f = fib()
        // 获取分割数据的下标
        while (high > f[k] - 1) {
            k++
        }
        // f[k] 值 可能大于数组的长度，需要 构造新数组，并指向 arr[]
        let temp = [].concat(arr)
        if (arr.length < f[k]) {
            let len = f[k] - arr.length
            for (let i = 0; i < len; i++) {
                temp.push(arr[high])
            }
        }
        // console.log(temp)
        while (low <= high) {
            mid = low + f[k - 1] - 1
            if (findVal < temp[mid]) {
                // 向数组的左边查找
                high = mid - 1
                // 全部元素 = 前面的元素 + 后面的元素
                // f[k] = f[k-1] + f[k-2]
                // 前面有f[k-1]个元素,所以可继续拆分 f[k-1] = f[k-2] + f[k-3]
                // 即 在 f[k-1]的前面继续查找 k--
                // 即下次循环  mid = f[k-1-1] -1
                k--
            } else if (findVal > temp[mid]) {
                // 向右查找
                low = mid + 1
                // f[k] = f[k-1] + f[k-2]
                // f[k-2] = f[k-3]+f[k-4]
                // 下次循环 mid = f[k-1-2]-1
                k -= 2
            } else {
                if (mid <= high) return mid
                else return high
            }
        }
        return -1
    }
    console.log(arr)
    console.log(fibSearch(arr, 5))
